hiveArticle.title: Ganesh Visarjan 2019
hiveArticle.body:
In India, we had celebrated Ganesh Utsav for almost 11 days and then it was time for Visarjan. Though in Bangalore, all the pandals keep Ganesh Idol for only 3 days. This was the scene yesterday when they were taking the Idol for Visarjan.

![IMG_1646.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQ2nkTf3cQv8SzNDHdbv6FEwrrwcYewAKXbSCTZNGFD7X)

![IMG_1647.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVF2kkkcLr5fuZRoU24VFKvVDx2Mb9QaRHphzfjTFQpeh)

![IMG_1644_01.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmafDGfnts4N4nur2jaLzBm7VvKKYrnMNBTYUoQ8sy98qz)
